ROMBLIP.original: The flashing ~BLIP_27~ on the radar shows where to meet Roman.
ROMBLIP.translated: 小地图上闪烁的~BLIP_27~表示与Roman碰面的地点。

ROMBLIP.original: Go see Roman when the ~BLIP_27~ is on display.
Sleeping on the bed will save the game and advance time by six hours.
ROMBLIP.translated: 上床睡觉会保存游戏进度，并将时间推进6个小时。

ROMBLIP.original: The flashing ~BLIP_29~ on the radar shows the entrance to this apartment. You can save the game here.
ROMBLIP.translated: 小地图上闪烁的~BLIP_29~表示这间公寓的入口。你可以在这里保存游戏进度。
